entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
